title: Funding opportunity: BBSRC Brazil pump-priming award
organization: Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council
description: Last updated: 17 June 2024 - see all updates Pump-priming awards supported by BBSRC and the São Paulo Research Foundation (FAPESP) are for BBSRC-supported researchers and consortia of academics. They are to pump-prime collaborations between UK and Brazilian scientists in São Paulo state. Funding of up to £35,000 for the UK side is mainly for networking and travel, but can also include some modest research costs. Brazilian counterparts should apply for equivalent funding from FAPESP.
